meanings.definition: Causing or capable of causing harm
meanings.sent1: Exposure to harmful chemicals can be dangerous.
meanings.sent2: It is important to avoid harmful substances.
meanings.sent3: The harmful effects of eating too much candy are evident.
meanings.sent4: His harmful words left emotional scars on her.
meanings.sent5: The harmful impact of pollution on the environment is alarming.

meanings.sent1: Wearing proper safety gear can prevent harmful accidents.
meanings.sent2: The storm caused harmful effects on the buildings.
meanings.sent3: The harmful force of the wind blew the hat off his head.
meanings.sent4: The harmful impact of the collision was severe.
meanings.sent5: The harmful scratches on the car needed repair.

meanings.sent1: Smoking is a harmful habit that can lead to health problems.
meanings.sent2: The harmful behavior of the bullies affected the students.
meanings.sent3: The harmful consequences of skipping class were evident.
meanings.sent4: Her harmful choices led to negative outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The harmful effects of procrastination can be felt later.
